remarks: The value of the norm function using a restricted metric.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
statement:
nmfval.n $e |- N = ( norm ` W ) $.
nmfval.x $e |- X = ( Base ` W ) $.
nmfval.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
nmfval.d $e |- D = ( dist ` W ) $.
nmfval.e $e |- E = ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) $.
nmfval2 $p |- ( W e. Grp -> N = ( x e. X |-> ( x E .0. ) ) ) $.
$d .0. x $.
$d D x $.
$d W x $.
$d X x $.
